Answer
No, it is not possible for a datapoint(s) to be material and for the related Disclosure Requirement
not to be material when disclosing information on metrics.
ESRS structure the information to be disclosed under Disclosure Requirements, and each
Disclosure Requirement consists of one or more distinct datapoints (ESRS 1 paragraph 16). One
datapoint (or more) related to a Disclosure Requirement in a topical standard assessed as material
